uq4cgDNA Documentation¶

Welcome to the documentation of uq4cgDNA, an uncertainty quantification framework for the cgDNA model. For a short introduction including installation instructions, please refer to the Getting Started section. For more details regarding the underlying theory of the package, have a look at the Theory. The Tutorial provides an example of how to use uq4cgDNA. Lastly, the API sectioncontains the documentation of the source code.
